task.title: Modifying User Roles
task.shortdesc: If you would like to change the user role of a project member, you can do so from the project dashboard. Only project administrators can add new project administrators.

step.cmd: In the Project member column, check the box beside the name of the user whose role you would like to modify.
Click on Modify roles, at the bottom of the Project member column.
step.info: If you do not select a user before you click on the Modify roles button, you will be taken to the Group overview page. You can select a user from the list and click on the Modify roles button at the bottom of the page to continue on to step 2.

step.cmd: Select the member role you would like to apply to the selected user and click on Next
This will take you to a confirmation page. Click on Confirm.
